system.description:
You concentrate for 1 minute, examining an object to make an Arcana check. If successful, you replicate the effect of casting the identify spell on it. The DC is based on the rarity of the item.

Item Rarity DC
Common 10
Uncommon 13
Rare 16
Very Rare 19
Legendary 22

In addition, starting at level 6 once per long rest you may spend 1 minute concentrating and expend a hit die to replicate the effects of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.24rmiwo0w5pd746x]{Legend Lore} spell.
